column4: Has anyone had problems with Wireless on Ibex since the latest sting upgrades?
My SSH connections freeze up for 10-20 seconds, every 10-20 seconds...
Yeah, like PC = Windows... I hate that they imply that

I agree with that... It's really awful. My boss owns all Apple stuff... breaks all of the time, and he STILL swears by Mac... Can't understand why I bought a Thinkpad. They seem a HELL of a lot more reliable.
